channel.title: Runecrafting pouches
channel.description:
so i want runecrafting pouches to hold the essence, of course. Only problem is i have more than one option. like fill, empty etc. How do i make it so i only use a certain one. So lets say i click fill, it fills up the bag with 3 rune essence but if i click empty it empties everything out.. Im using Hyperion btw. Thanks.
Also this is kind of a random question, but, what is perfect combat referring to? Of course combat, but i mean does it refer to having all specials and stuff like that?
